title: Shiro Plum  My First Fruit & How You Can Grow One Too #shorts

tasks.task: Planting and caring for a Shiro plum tree.
subtasks: Planting the tree in an appropriate location (full sun, good drainage).
Pruning the tree annually, including late winter pruning to shape and improve light penetration.
Managing the tree's size through pruning.
Recognizing the first fruit production several years after planting.
Identifying ripeness (skin golden, slight give to touch).
Harvesting fruit gently with a twist.
Enjoying the fruit fresh or using it for jams and desserts.
